column1: Remember to smile in front of adversity. Eduardo Bonvallet
Never stop fighting for your dreams. Eduardo Bonvallet
Always bring positive energy into what you do. Eduardo Bonvallet
Humour is the best remedy for life's challenges. Eduardo Bonvallet
There are millions of people better than you, but never forget that dedication leads to progress. Eduardo Bonvallet
If you got a knee injury, go to the gym and work on your upper body. Work smart Eduardo Bonvallet
It is good to know sucess and defeat. Eduardo Bonvallet
You need to love yourself and like what you see on the mirror. Eduardo Bonvallet
Things are not always simple, sometimes you need to crawl before you can walk. Eduardo Bonvallet
Don't be afraid to start over. Build something better this time. Eduardo
